show.title: Ranching Reboot
show.summary: Rebooting your thinking about Farming, Ranching and Food production. Conversations in land stewardship with some of today's most innovative ranchers and producers. Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/ranching-reboot/support

title: #56 Texas Slim "Bitcoin and the Beef Initiative Unpacked"
subtitle: #56 Texas Slim "Bitcoin and the Beef Initiative Unpacked"
summary:
My friend Texas Slim joins me again to unpack some of the myth and mystery around bitcoin and answer some lingering questions that I had.


Check out Slim's podcast:

https://twitter.com/modernTman

https://beefinitiative.com/

https://inititive.substack.com/
